mainText:
When I first came to the USA back in 1984, the first computer that I  
learned how to program and do simple math on was an Apple 2C and the Apple  2E.  
From then it only got bigger and better.  Steve gave IBM a run  for their 
money.  Mac's where ahead of their time in graphics design  and sound.  It is 
amazing what this one man accomplished in his  lifetime.  He will be missed.
header: what a man and what a machine
author: Rudolf
